overview: CallSeniorCare.com is the most active compassionate caregiving community with a built-in intelligent senior care matching system which connects seniors/families with in home caregivers, home care agencies, senior housing, advisors, support groups, products and all other senior care services, and vice versa with just a few clicks while providing ways to communicate, share information, and remain involved in caregiving decisions using senior care support tools like video conferencing, secure private groups, to do lists, private messaging, document, photo & video sharing technologies with full-fledged privacy controls - Perfect Senior Care is Just a Few Clicks Away.
